content.en: Enhancing motor control: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the performance of sensorless control of induction motors. They have found that algorithms such as the extended Kalman filter (EKF) and the recursive least squares (RLS) algorithm can enhance the speed estimation of these motors. Additionally, the use of techniques like the braided EKF approach and the chained extended Kalman filter (CEKF) based estimation technique can overcome challenges related to parameter uncertainties and variations in resistance. These advancements in algorithmic estimation have the potential to enhance the control and efficiency of induction motors.
content.da: Forbedring af motorstyring: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre ydelsen i sensorløs styring af induktionsmotorer. De har fundet ud af, at algoritmer som den udvidede Kalman-filter (EKF) og den rekursive mindste kvadraters (RLS) algoritme kan forbedre hastighedsestimeringen af disse motorer. Desuden kan anvendelsen af teknikker som den flettede EKF-tilgang og den kædede udvidede Kalman-filter (CEKF) baserede estimeringsteknik overvinde udfordringer relateret til parameterusikkerheder og variationer i modstand. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmisk estimering har potentialet til at forbedre styringen og effektiviteten af induktionsmotorer.
